sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {ChakraProvider, Container, Box, Stack, Image, Text, Heading, Link} from '@chakra-ui/react';
import './Nyoba.css';

const Headline = () => {
    return (
        <ChakraProvider>
            <Container maxW="1364px" h="1000px" bg="tomato">
                <Stack direction={['column','column','row','row']} spacing={['100px','','','190px']} justify='center'>
                    <Box className="order" pt={['10','','','300px']}>
                        <Stack direction="column" spacing="30px">
                            <Box bg="yellow.200">
                                <Stack direction="row">
                                    <Box><Link><Image width="30px" src="/Play.png" /></Link></Box>
                                    <Box pt="5px"><Text fontWeight="semibold">In every beginning, there is chaos.</Text></Box>
                                </Stack>
                            </Box>
                            <Box maxW="400px" bg="gray.50">
                                <Heading>Peaceful shopping. Mindful money.</Heading>
                            </Box>
                            <Box maxW="400px" bg="pink.100">
                                <Text>See how we can help with making your shopping experience and money management more ZEN.</Text>
                            </Box>
                            <Box>
                                <Stack direction="row">
                                    <Link>
                                        <Image src="/playappstore/download-on-the-app-store.svg" />
                                    </Link>
                                    <Link>
                                        <Image src="/playappstore/google-play-store-badge-en.svg" />
                                    </Link>
                                </Stack>
                            </Box>
                        </Stack>
                    </Box>
                    <Box className="order" pt={['','','','150px']}>
                        <Image w={['','','','600px']} src="/Section/Headline.png" />
                    </Box>
                </Stack>
            </Container>
        </ChakraProvider>
    )
}

export default Headline
